fields.label: Introduction Video
fields.video_description: The charm of this website theme is in its simplicity â€“ the clean, well-structured layouts, the beautiful, easy to customize design blocks, the variety of grids and no code skills required. Each page layout is focused on clarity and presenting your content in a beautiful, coherent way. Check this video to see what templates, layouts, blocks you get with Fiji theme.
fields.video_embed: <iframe width="800" height="500" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/v3Zx_QSKf2Q" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

fields.label: Next Steps
fields.message: Now that you are familiar with the Fiji theme layouts, templates, blocks and options, let's go ahead and get started with the initial setup process by going to the 2. Getting Started section located in the left Sidebar. This section will be useful for you to get the information about the plugins that we recommend using. In 2. Getting Started you will also get an option to install the Demo Content that may help you to start working with the new site faster. Let's get started!
